version_description: A new update version 5.1 which fixes iOS8.0 related issues including Transfer and Wi-Fi Restore is available from the App Store. However, we deeply apologize that we were able to confirm an issue with the Dashboard being inaccessible for this version, and a new update to address this has been submitted.

A new update version 5.1 which fixes iOS8.0 related issues including Transfer and Wi-Fi Restore is available from the App Store. However, we deeply apologize that we were able to confirm an issue with the Dashboard being inaccessible for this version, and a new update to address this has been submitted.
- Dashboard crash fix.
- Dashboard crash fix.

- Brand New Design. (PLEASE CHECK OUT THE NEW DESIGN BEFORE UPGRADING, http://www.mobilewareinc.com/ixnew/intro.html )
- Multi-Device Sync.
- iPad Version.
- Plus Many More Enhancements.
IT IS RECOMMENDED TO MAKE A BACKUP OF YOUR DATA PRIOR TO UPDATING

- Brand New Design. (PLEASE CHECK OUT THE NEW DESIGN BEFORE UPGRADING, http://www.mobilewareinc.com/ixnew/intro.html )
- Multi-Device Sync.
- iPad Version.
- Plus Many More Enhancements.
IT IS RECOMMENDED TO MAKE A BACKUP OF YOUR DATA PRIOR TO UPDATING

- Data conversion bug fixed (categories without subcategories, receipts.)
- Main Dashboard style reverted back.
- Vendor quick fill data entry feature.
- Removed Vendor name and Subcategory requirement.
- Improved stability
- Plus many other minor bugs and issues fixed.
PLEASE EMAIL US DIRECTLY IF YOU EXPERIENCED ANY ISSUES SO THAT WE CAN ADDRESS THEM.

- Data conversion bug fixed (categories without subcategories, receipts.)
- Main Dashboard style reverted back.
- Vendor quick fill data entry feature.
- Removed Vendor name and Subcategory requirement.
- Improved stability
- Plus many other minor bugs and issues fixed.
PLEASE EMAIL US DIRECTLY IF YOU EXPERIENCED ANY ISSUES SO THAT WE CAN ADDRESS THEM.

- Fixed a rare launching issue.
- Custom report date range fixed
- Custom report group by now supports yearly, monthly, weekly, daily
- Improved vendor entry performance
- Calculator decimal button fixed. 
- New transaction to use selected date.
- Budget by category reinstated.
- Added back cash-basis accounting calculation for Expense, Cash-flow and Category Budget summary.
- Plus minor fixes and enhancements.

Improved stability
Other enhancements and bug fixes.
